posts.body:
Been a while since I was a part of a sekrit club, feels good. I would be perfectly okay with us keeping out heads down like this; maybe the normalniggers will move to Voat or endchan or something.

>>7f68f227-b1a8-4d7f-ba67-5f6984a4234f
The Qlarp was basically our own Chanology.

>>530f1666-db2c-455d-aa39-5a145e4365bb
>HF Packet Radio
Holy shit fuck no. Even with a decent connection and fast modem it's a fraction of the speed of dial-up and is about as resilient as a piece of tissue paper. Hijacking a satellite would probably be the better way to go, but because that would be illegal I'm not recommending that course of action in any way, shape or form.
